data.title: Novar Technologies top contact details
data.meta_description: Novar Technologies details employee details like email id, direct dials and phone numbers, founders, CEO, CTO, CSO, CRO, CMO, revenue, size, industry, employees, website technologies, built with and other details.
data.text:
NOVAR Technologies is a division of Opulens Corporation focused on developing technology for independent laboratories and ECPs. Our drive to find improvements in the field of ophthalmic optics has made us one of the pioneers in the manufacture of lenses with FREEFORM technology. We have an in-house R&D team to develop lens designs and measuring devices that meet the needs of increasingly demanding professionals. Our track record in ophthalmic design allowed us to develop in-depth lens production knowledge to provide high quality products and services worldwide View More

Specialities
